analyzed: nyi shu gsum la gre / nyi shu bzhi la dbo //

analyzed: nyi shu drug la nag pa /

original: nyi shu bdun la sa ri /
analyzed: nyi shu bdun la sa ri /

analyzed: dgu na zla tha chungs kyi tshes gcig la snrubs /

analyzed: tshes bzhi la byi bzhin /

original: lnga la gro bzhin /
analyzed: lnga la gro bzhin /

original: drug la mon gru /
analyzed: drug la mon gru /

analyzed: bdun la mon gre / brgyad la khrums stod /

original: dgu la khrums smad /

original: bcu gsum la smin drug / bcu bzhi la snar ma /
analyzed: bcu gsum la smin drug / bcu bzhi la snar ma /

original: bco lnga la mgo /
analyzed: bco lnga la mgo /

original: bcu drug la lag / bcu bdun la nab so //
analyzed: bcu drug la lag / bcu bdun la nab so //

analyzed: bco brgyad la rgyal / bcu dgu la skag / nyi shu la mchu /

analyzed: nyi shu bzhi la nag pa /

analyzed: nyi shu drug la sa ga /

original: nyi shu bdun la lha mtshams /
analyzed: nyi shu bdun la lha mtshams /

analyzed: nyi shu brgyad la snon //

original: nyi shu dgu la snubs //🔽gnam stong la chu stod /
analyzed: nyi shu dgu la snubs // gnam stong la chu stod /

original: nyin mtshan re re la chu tshod drug cu drug cu yod do //
analyzed: nyin mtshan re re la chu tshod drug cu drug cu yod do //

original: dpyid zla rab la nyin mo chu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi /
analyzed: dpyid zla rab la nyin mo chu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi /
translated: In the first spring month, the day has twenty-four muhūrtas.

original: mtshan mo sum cu rtsa drug go //
analyzed: mtshan mo sum cu rtsa drug go //
translated: The night has thirty-six muhūrtas.🔽In the middle spring month, the day has twenty-six muhūrtas.

analyzed: dpyid zla 'bring po la nyin mo nyi shu rtsa drug / mtshan mo sum cu rtsa bzhi'o //

original: dpyid zla tha chungs la nyin mo chu tshod nyi shu rtsa brgyad /
analyzed: dpyid zla tha chungs la nyin mo chu tshod nyi shu rtsa brgyad /
translated: In the last spring month, the day has twenty-eight muhūrtas.

original: nub mo sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: nub mo sum cu rtsa gnyis so //

original: dbyar zla ra ba la nyin mtshan gnyis la chu tshod sum cu sum cu mnyam mo //
analyzed: dbyar zla ra ba la nyin mtshan gnyis la chu tshod sum cu sum cu mnyam mo //
translated: In the first summer month, day and night are equal to thirty hours.

original: dbyar zla 'bring po la nyin mo chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis /
analyzed: dbyar zla 'bring po la nyin mo chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis /
translated: In the second summer month, the day is thirty-two hours and

original: nub mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
analyzed: nub mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
translated: the night is twenty-eight hours.

original: dbyar zla tha chungs la nyin mo chu tshod sum cu rtsa bzhi /
analyzed: dbyar zla tha chungs la nyin mo chu tshod sum cu rtsa bzhi /
translated: In the third summer month, the day is thirty-four hours and

original: nub mo nyi shu rtsa drug go //
analyzed: nub mo nyi shu rtsa drug go //
translated: the night is twenty-six hours.🔽In the first autumn month, the day is thirty-six hours and

original: ston zla ra ba la nyin mo chu tshod sum cu rtsa drug / nub mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: ston zla ra ba la nyin mo chu tshod sum cu rtsa drug / nub mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: the night is twenty-four hours.

original: ston zla 'bring po la nyin mo chu tshod sum cu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: ston zla 'bring po la nyin mo chu tshod sum cu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: In the second autumn month, the day is thirty-four hours and

original: nub mo la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa drug go //
analyzed: nub mo la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa drug go //
translated: the night is twenty-six hours.

original: ston zla tha chungs la nyin mo chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis /
analyzed: ston zla tha chungs la nyin mo chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis /
translated: In the third autumn month, the day is thirty-two hours and

original: nub mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
analyzed: nub mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
translated: the night is twenty-eight hours.

original: dgun zla ra ba la nyin mtshan gnyis ka la chu tshod sum cu sum cu'o //
analyzed: dgun zla ra ba la nyin mtshan gnyis ka la chu tshod sum cu sum cu'o //
translated: In the first winter month, day and night are equal to thirty hours.

original: dgun zla 'bring po la nyin mo chu tshod nyi shu rtsa brgyad /
analyzed: dgun zla 'bring po la nyin mo chu tshod nyi shu rtsa brgyad /
translated: In the second winter month, the day is twenty-eight hours and

original: mtshan mo sum cu rtsa gnyis /
analyzed: mtshan mo sum cu rtsa gnyis /
translated: the night is thirty-two hours.

original: dgun zla tha chungs la nyin mo nyi shu rtsa drug /
analyzed: dgun zla tha chungs la nyin mo nyi shu rtsa drug /
translated: In the last winter month, there are twenty-six days and🔽thirty-four hours of night.

original: nub mo chu tshod sum cu rtsa bzhi'o de bzhin du dus tshod bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: nub mo chu tshod sum cu rtsa bzhi'o de bzhin du dus tshod bcu gnyis so //
translated: Thus, there are twelve periods of time.

original: de yang dpyid zla ra ba la rgyal mtshan no //🔽dpyid zla 'bring po la seng ge'o //
analyzed: de yang dpyid zla ra ba la rgyal mtshan no // dpyid zla 'bring po la seng ge'o //
translated: Further, in the first spring month, there is Dhvaja;🔽in the second spring month, there is Simha;

original: dpyid zla tha chungs la khye'o //🔽dbyar zla ra ba la glang //🔽dbyar zla 'bring po la rus sbal /
analyzed: dpyid zla tha chungs la khye'o // dbyar zla ra ba la glang // dbyar zla 'bring po la rus sbal /
translated: in the third spring month, there is Kumuda;🔽in the first summer month, there is Gaja;

original: dbyar zla tha chungs la bong bu'o //🔽ston zla ra bal chu srin /🔽ston zla 'bring po la dung /
analyzed: dbyar zla tha chungs la bong bu'o // ston zla ra bal chu srin / ston zla 'bring po la dung /
translated: in the second summer month, there is Kūrma;🔽in the third summer month, there is Śaṇa;🔽in the first autumn month, there is Makara;

original: ston zla tha chungs la rnga mo'o //🔽dgun zla ra ba la gzhu /🔽dgun zla 'bring po la mda'/
analyzed: ston zla tha chungs la rnga mo'o // dgun zla ra ba la gzhu / dgun zla 'bring po la mda'/
translated: in the second autumn month, there is Śṛgāla;🔽and in the third autumn month, there is Dvipada.🔽In the first winter month, there is Dhanus;🔽in the second winter month, there is Matsya;

original: dgun zla tha chungs la glang po che'o //
analyzed: dgun zla tha chungs la glang po che'o //
translated: and in the third winter month, there is Hasti.

original: dpyid zla rab la tshes gcig nas gnam stong man chad du /
analyzed: dpyid zla rab la tshes gcig nas gnam stong man chad du /
translated: In the first spring month, from the first day up to the thirtieth,

original: nyi ma re re la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi /
analyzed: nyi ma re re la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi /
translated: there are twenty-four hours in each day

original: dus tshod bcu gnyis la /
analyzed: dus tshod bcu gnyis la /
translated: and twelve periods of time.

original: nyi ma shar nas bcu gnyis cha gcig la rgyal mtshan gyi dus so //
analyzed: nyi ma shar nas bcu gnyis cha gcig la rgyal mtshan gyi dus so //
translated: From sunrise to the first of the twelve parts of the day is the time of the banner.

original: cha gnyis la seng ge'i dus so //
analyzed: cha gnyis la seng ge'i dus so //
translated: The second part is the time of the lion.

original: cha gsum la khyi'i dus so //
analyzed: cha gsum la khyi'i dus so //
translated: The third part is the time of the dog.

original: cha bzhi pa glang gi dus /
analyzed: cha bzhi pa glang gi dus /
translated: The fourth part is the time of the elephant.

original: cha lnga pa rus sbal gyi dus /
analyzed: cha lnga pa rus sbal gyi dus /
translated: The fifth part is the time of the tortoise.

original: cha drug pa bong bu'i dus /
analyzed: cha drug pa bong bu'i dus /
translated: The sixth part is the time of the donkey.

original: cha bdun pa chu srin gyi dus /
analyzed: cha bdun pa chu srin gyi dus /
translated: The seventh part is the time of the crocodile.

original: cha brgyad pa la dung gi @211a * //
analyzed: cha brgyad pa la dung gi @211a * //
translated: The eighth part is the time of the conch.

original: dus ; cha dgu pa rnga mo'i dus /🔽cha bcu pa gzhu'i dus /
analyzed: dus ; cha dgu pa rnga mo'i dus / cha bcu pa gzhu'i dus /
translated: The ninth part is the time of the camel.🔽The tenth part is the time of the bow.

original: cha bcu gcig pa mda'i dus /
analyzed: cha bcu gcig pa mda'i dus /
translated: The eleventh part is the time of the arrow.

original: cha bcu gnyis pa glang po che'o //
analyzed: cha bcu gnyis pa glang po che'o //
translated: The twelfth part is the time of the elephant.

original: la la lug zer ro //
analyzed: la la lug zer ro //
translated: Some say it is the time of the sheep.

original: nyi ma gcig la tshu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa la /
analyzed: nyi ma gcig la tshu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa la /
translated: One day has twenty-four muhūrtas.

original: dus tshod re re la chu tshod gnyis gnyis kun la shes par bya'o //🔽dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes gcig yan chod nas gnam stong man chad kyi nub re re la /
analyzed: dus tshod re re la chu tshod gnyis gnyis kun la shes par bya'o // dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes gcig yan chod nas gnam stong man chad kyi nub re re la /
translated: It should be understood that each muhūrtas has two hours.

original: dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod la /
analyzed: dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod la /
translated: From the first day of the first autumn month up to the thirtieth day, each evening has twelve muhūrtas.

original: rgyal mtshan dang glang po che'i bar du dus tshod kyi rgyu lugs ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan dang glang po che'i bar du dus tshod kyi rgyu lugs ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The way of passing time between the banner and the elephant is the same as before.

original: dus re re la chu tshod gsum gsum du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dus re re la chu tshod gsum gsum du shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that each time period is three hours.

original: dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong man chad du /
analyzed: dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong man chad du /
translated: From the first day of the middle month of spring until the thirtieth day,

original: nyi ma re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa la /
analyzed: nyi ma re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa la /
translated: each day has twelve two-hour periods.

original: nyi ma gcig gi bcu gnyis cha gcig la seng ge rgyu ba'i dus /
analyzed: nyi ma gcig gi bcu gnyis cha gcig la seng ge rgyu ba'i dus /
translated: One of the twelve parts of a day is the lion’s period.

original: cha gnyis la khyi'i dus /
analyzed: cha gnyis la khyi'i dus /
translated: Two parts are the dog’s period.

original: cha gsum pa glang gi dus /
analyzed: cha gsum pa glang gi dus /
translated: The third part is the elephant’s period.

original: cha bzhi ba rus sbal gyi dus /
analyzed: cha bzhi ba rus sbal gyi dus /
translated: The fourth part is the tortoise’s period.

original: cha lnga pa la bong bu'i dus /
analyzed: cha lnga pa la bong bu'i dus /
translated: The fifth part is the donkey’s period.

original: cha drug pa la chu srin gyi dus /
analyzed: cha drug pa la chu srin gyi dus /
translated: The sixth part is the crocodile’s period.

original: cha bdun pa la dung gi dus /
analyzed: cha bdun pa la dung gi dus /
translated: The seventh part is the conch’s period.

original: cha brgyad pa la rnga mo'i dus /
analyzed: cha brgyad pa la rnga mo'i dus /
translated: The eighth part is the camel’s period.

original: cha dgu pa gzhu'i dus /🔽cha bcu pa mda'i dus /
analyzed: cha dgu pa gzhu'i dus / cha bcu pa mda'i dus /
translated: The ninth part is the bow’s period.🔽The tenth part is the arrow’s period.

original: cha bcu gcig pa glang po che'i dus /
analyzed: cha bcu gcig pa glang po che'i dus /
translated: The eleventh part is the elephant’s period.

original: cha bcu gnyis pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus so //
analyzed: cha bcu gnyis pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus so //
translated: The twelfth part is the banner’s period.

original: de la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa drug yod pa la /
analyzed: de la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa drug yod pa la /
translated: There are twenty-six two-hour periods in that.

original: dus tshod re re la chu tshod gnyis gnyis dang / skad cig ma brgya lnga bcu'o ;
analyzed: dus tshod re re la chu tshod gnyis gnyis dang / skad cig ma brgya lnga bcu'o ;
translated: Each of these has two hours and one hundred and fifty instants.

original: / seng ge la sogs pa'i dus tshod bcu gnyis ni /
analyzed: / seng ge la sogs pa'i dus tshod bcu gnyis ni /
translated: The twelve periods of the day, such as the period of the lion,

original: nyin mo dang 'dra /
analyzed: nyin mo dang 'dra /
translated: are like the day.

original: dus tshod bcu gnyis po de la /
analyzed: dus tshod bcu gnyis po de la /
translated: In these twelve periods,

original: chu tshod sum cu rtsa bzhi yod pa la /
analyzed: chu tshod sum cu rtsa bzhi yod pa la /
translated: there are thirty-four hours.🔽In each of these hours, there are one hundred and fifty instants.

original: dus tshod re re la chu tshod gsum du skad cig ma brgya lnga bcur ma tshang bar dus bcu gnyis po kun la shes par bya'o //

analyzed: glang ni blun pa'o //

original: rus sbal ni theg pa che ba'o //
analyzed: rus sbal ni theg pa che ba'o //

original: chu srin ni nye bar grub pa'o //
analyzed: chu srin ni nye bar grub pa'o //

original: dung ni brtan pa ste mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dung ni brtan pa ste mi 'gyur ba'o //

original: rnga mo ni las la ngan pa'o //
analyzed: rnga mo ni las la ngan pa'o //

original: gzhu ni 'khrul la bzang ba'o //

original: mda' ni 'bigs pa'o //
analyzed: mda' ni 'bigs pa'o //

original: glang po che ni 'dod chags la dga' ba'o //

original: // / kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: // / kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: lho nub mtshams nas ga dang lha mtshams gnas so //

original: zla bas skar ma mi thub /
analyzed: zla bas skar ma mi thub /

original: de bzhin du gza' rnams kyang lhag ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gza' rnams kyang lhag ste /
translated: Similarly, the number of planets is greater.

original: de bas na lo lnga lnga na zla ba re re bsnan pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na lo lnga lnga na zla ba re re bsnan pa'o //
translated: Therefore, every five years, one month is added.

original: de'i khongs su brtsis na /
analyzed: de'i khongs su brtsis na /
translated: When calculated in this way,

original: zla ba dang tshes grangs dang / skar ma dang / gza' tshad ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang tshes grangs dang / skar ma dang / gza' tshad ba'o //
translated: the number of months, days, stars, and planets are equal.

original: 'grib ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'grib ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ Diminution” means

original: gza' dang skar ma tshes grangs la rgyu ste /
analyzed: gza' dang skar ma tshes grangs la rgyu ste /
translated: that the planets, stars, and days are the causes.

original: de gsum gyi bye brag gis /
analyzed: de gsum gyi bye brag gis /
translated: Due to the specificities of those three,

original: bzang ba dang ngan pas 'grib pa'o //
analyzed: bzang ba dang ngan pas 'grib pa'o //
translated: there is diminution through good and bad.

original: 'phel ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'phel ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase increase and refers to

original: de bzhin du gza' dang skar ma gsum gyis bzang ngan gyis 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gza' dang skar ma gsum gyis bzang ngan gyis 'phel ba'o //
translated: the increase of good and bad [things] due to the three [factors of] planets, stars, and [other] celestial bodies.

original: bde ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bde ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase happiness and refers to🔽the three [factors of] planets, stars, and [other] celestial bodies.

original: de la yang gsum ka 'dzom pa'i dus su /
analyzed: de la yang gsum ka 'dzom pa'i dus su /
translated: When all three are complete,

original: skyes par gyur na bde ba phun sum tshogs ba'o //
analyzed: skyes par gyur na bde ba phun sum tshogs ba'o //
translated: if one is born, there is perfect happiness.

original: sdug bsngal ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase suffering and refers to

original: skyes pa'i chos grangs kyi khyad par yin te /
analyzed: skyes pa'i chos grangs kyi khyad par yin te /
translated: the special features of the number of phenomena of birth.

original: de yang gza' dang skar ma'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: de yang gza' dang skar ma'i khyad par ro //
translated: Those are also the special features of planets, stars, and [other] celestial bodies.

original: lo legs pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lo legs pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase good harvests and refers to

original: gza' dang skar ma lo dang zla ba bzang po'i khyad par gyis so //
analyzed: gza' dang skar ma lo dang zla ba bzang po'i khyad par gyis so //
translated: the special features of good years and months due to the special features of planets, stars, and [other] celestial bodies.

original: lo nyis ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lo nyis ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase bad harvests and refers to

original: de bzhin du gza' dang skar ma lo zla ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gza' dang skar ma lo zla ba ste /
translated: the special features of bad years and months due to the special features of planets, stars, and [other] celestial bodies.

original: de ngan pa'i skyon gyis de bas lo nyes pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / ltogs pa dang / nad mod pa dang / 'gro mi shes pa dang / de la sogs pa byung ba'o //
analyzed: de ngan pa'i skyon gyis de bas lo nyes pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / ltogs pa dang / nad mod pa dang / 'gro mi shes pa dang / de la sogs pa byung ba'o //
translated: Due to the fault of those [bad years and months], there are bad harvests, short lives, hunger, disease, inability to walk, and so forth.

original: de bzhin du bzang ba la yang shes par bya'o//
analyzed: de bzhin du bzang ba la yang shes par bya'o//
translated: It should be understood in the same way for good [omens].

original: @216b dag kyang ston pa rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: @216b dag kyang ston pa rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni /
translated: Also, remember the names of the teachers

original: gza' chen po dgu dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lo bcu gnyis dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang / dus drug dang / ra shi bcu gnyis dang / de rnams kyi khyad par gyis legs nyes ston pa'o //
analyzed: gza' chen po dgu dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lo bcu gnyis dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang / dus drug dang / ra shi bcu gnyis dang / de rnams kyi khyad par gyis legs nyes ston pa'o //
translated: means that the nine great planets, the twenty-eight lunar mansions, the twelve years, the twelve months, the six seasons, and the twelve rashis, by their distinctions, indicate good and bad.

original: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni /
translated: As for thus,

original: gza' dgu po lta ba'o //
analyzed: gza' dgu po lta ba'o //
translated: it is the observation of the nine planets.

original: gza' nyi ma dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gza' nyi ma dang zhes bya ba ni /

original: me'i khams yin te /
analyzed: me'i khams yin te /
translated: it is the fire element.

original: de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni /
analyzed: de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni /

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /

original: sku mdog dmar po /
analyzed: sku mdog dmar po /

analyzed: gza' zla ba zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: gza' mig dmar zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The planet Mars is

original: g-yas na dbyug to mig can /

original: me'i khams so //

translated: The planet Mercury is

original: gza' phur bu dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gza' phur bu dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The planet Jupiter is

original: shing gi khams so //
analyzed: shing gi khams so //
translated: the wood element.

original: sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
translated: He is white in color, with one face and two hands.

original: g-yas g-yon mda' gzhu thogs pa /
analyzed: g-yas g-yon mda' gzhu thogs pa /
translated: In his right hand he holds a bow, and in his left hand he holds an arrow.

original: glang po che la zhon pa'o //
analyzed: glang po che la zhon pa'o //
translated: He rides an elephant.

original: gza' spen pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gza' spen pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The planet Saturn is

original: chu'i khams so //
analyzed: chu'i khams so //
translated: the water element.

original: sku mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: sku mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
translated: He is yellow in color, with one face and two hands.

original: g-yas na pu sti /🔽g-yon na bum pa /
analyzed: g-yas na pu sti /🔽g-yon na bum pa /
translated: In his right hand he holds a pustaka.🔽In his left hand he holds a vase.

original: rdo'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //🔽gza' lag ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o // gza' lag ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He sits on a stone seat.🔽The planet Rahu

original: lcags gyi khams so //
analyzed: lcags gyi khams so //
translated: is the element of iron.

original: sku mdog ljang nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: sku mdog ljang nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
translated: He is dark green, with one face and two arms.

original: g-yas ral gri / g-yon sdigs mdzub rus sbal la zhon pa'o //🔽r'a hu la dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: g-yas ral gri / g-yon sdigs mdzub rus sbal la zhon pa'o // r'a hu la dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He holds a sword in his right hand and makes a threatening gesture with his left hand. He rides on a tortoise.🔽The planet Ketu

original: khams lnga ka'o //
analyzed: khams lnga ka'o //
translated: is the five elements.

original: mdog nag po //
analyzed: mdog nag po //
translated: He is black.

original: smad sbul  du 'dug pa /
analyzed: smad sbul  du 'dug pa /
translated: His lower body is coiled up.

original: dbu skra ser po /
analyzed: dbu skra ser po /
translated: His hair is yellow.

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
translated: He has one face and two arms.🔽He holds the sun and moon in his two hands.🔽He sits on a cloud seat.

original: nyi ma dang zla ba phyag gnyis na bsnams pa /
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba phyag gnyis na bsnams pa /
translated: The planet Dhūmaketu🔽is the five elements.🔽 He is smoke-colored, with one face and two arms.🔽He holds a sword in his right hand.🔽He holds a noose in his left hand.

original: sprin gyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: sprin gyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
translated: He resides in the five elements.🔽If one wishes to study the knowledge of these planets, one should examine the differences between good and bad and act accordingly.

original: gza' du ba mjug rings /
analyzed: gza' du ba mjug rings /
translated: The planet Śukra

original: @217a * // dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: @217a * // dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: is the five elements.🔽 He is white, with one face and two arms.🔽He holds a sword in his right hand.

original: mdog dud ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis ba /
analyzed: mdog dud ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis ba /
translated: He holds a noose in his left hand.🔽He resides in the five elements.🔽The planet Śani🔽is the five elements.🔽 He is black, with one face and two arms.🔽He holds a sword in his right hand.

original: phyag g-yas na ral gri bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yas na ral gri bsnams pa /
translated: He holds a noose in his left hand.🔽He resides in the five elements.🔽The planet Rāhu

original: g-yon na zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon na zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
translated: is the element of iron.🔽 He is dark green, with one face and two arms.🔽He holds a sword in his right hand and makes a threatening gesture with his left hand. He rides on a tortoise.🔽The planet Ketu

original: khams lnga ka la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: khams lnga ka la gnas pa'o //
translated: is the five elements.🔽 He is black.🔽His lower body is coiled up.🔽His hair is yellow.🔽He has one face and two arms.🔽He holds the sun and moon in his two hands.🔽He sits on a cloud seat.

original: gza' de rnams kyi dus su rig pa slob par 'dod na bzang ngan gyi khyad par brtags la bya'o //
analyzed: gza' de rnams kyi dus su rig pa slob par 'dod na bzang ngan gyi khyad par brtags la bya'o //
translated: The planet Dhūmaketu🔽is the five elements.🔽 He is smoke-colored, with one face and two arms.🔽He holds a sword in his right hand.

original: chos dang slob ma 'dzin pa bo //
analyzed: chos dang slob ma 'dzin pa bo //
translated: He holds a noose in his left hand.🔽He resides in the five elements.

original: slob dpon 'dzin pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: slob dpon 'dzin pa de bzhin no //
translated: The same is true of the master.

original: gza' chen phur bu'i dus su ni /
analyzed: gza' chen phur bu'i dus su ni /
translated: If one begins at the time of the great planet Mars,

original: dbu 'dzugs de ni bzang ba yin //
analyzed: dbu 'dzugs de ni bzang ba yin //
translated: that is an excellent beginning.

original: de bzhin rig pa gzhan la yang //
analyzed: de bzhin rig pa gzhan la yang //
translated: Likewise, for other planets,

original: de yi dus su bzang bar bshad //🔽skra mdud gos ni gsar ba'am //
analyzed: de yi dus su bzang bar bshad // skra mdud gos ni gsar ba'am //
translated: their time is explained as excellent.🔽If one cuts one’s hair, puts on new clothes,

original: zas dang gsar pa gang byed pa //
analyzed: zas dang gsar pa gang byed pa //
translated: or does anything new

original: de yi dus su bzang bar bshad //
analyzed: de yi dus su bzang bar bshad //
translated: at that time, it is explained as excellent.🔽If one shaves one’s head, cuts one’s nails,🔽or sews clothes, or if one acquires

original: skra 'jar sen mo 'breg pa dang // de bzhin gos bzo byed pa dang // rta dang glang po sogs pa'i nor //
analyzed: skra 'jar sen mo 'breg pa dang // de bzhin gos bzo byed pa dang // rta dang glang po sogs pa'i nor //
translated: wealth such as horses, elephants, and so on,

original: de yi dus su phyir mi gtang //
analyzed: de yi dus su phyir mi gtang //
translated: at that time one should not give them away.

original: gal te btang bar gyur na ni //
analyzed: gal te btang bar gyur na ni //
translated: If one does give them away,

original: khar ce log par 'gyur ba'o //🔽nyi ma spen ba'i gza' gnyis la //
analyzed: khar ce log par 'gyur ba'o // nyi ma spen ba'i gza' gnyis la //
translated: it will lead to misfortune.🔽If one begins at the time of the two planets,

original: mgo 'dzugs de ni 'bring por bshad //
analyzed: mgo 'dzugs de ni 'bring por bshad //
translated: the sun and Saturn, that is explained as middling.

original: dmag dang 'khrug pa gang byed pa //
analyzed: dmag dang 'khrug pa gang byed pa //
translated: If one leads an army into battle

original: de yi dus su 'dren pa na //
analyzed: de yi dus su 'dren pa na //
translated: at that time,

original: rab tu yang dag bshad par bya //
analyzed: rab tu yang dag bshad par bya //
translated: it should be explained as excellent.

original: skra dang sen mo gos la sogs //
analyzed: skra dang sen mo gos la sogs //
translated: If one cuts one’s hair, nails, or clothes,

original: de yi dus su byas na ni //
analyzed: de yi dus su byas na ni //
translated: at that time

original: nad dang rims la sogs pa 'byung //
analyzed: nad dang rims la sogs pa 'byung //
translated: diseases, epidemics, and so on, will occur.

original: shi ba'i dus la bab pa'o //
analyzed: shi ba'i dus la bab pa'o //
translated: The time of death has arrived.🔽If one begins a journey, an empowerment, and so forth,

original: lam 'gro dbang bskur la sogs dang // nyi ma'i dus su bzang bar bshad //
analyzed: lam 'gro dbang bskur la sogs dang // nyi ma'i dus su bzang bar bshad //
translated: or if one does something at noon, it is said to be good.

original: sben pa'i dus su de byas na //
analyzed: sben pa'i dus su de byas na //
translated: If one does something at the time of twilight,

original: shin tu ngan par de bshad do //
analyzed: shin tu ngan par de bshad do //
translated: it is explained as being very bad.

original: gal te de dus byas na ni //
analyzed: gal te de dus byas na ni //
translated: If one dies at that time,

original: nad 'byung khar ce log par 'gyur //🔽mig dmar dang ni lag ba la //
analyzed: nad 'byung khar ce log par 'gyur // mig dmar dang ni lag ba la //
translated: it is like a reversal at the threshold of illness.

original: rig pa gang gi mgo 'dzugs pa //
analyzed: rig pa gang gi mgo 'dzugs pa //
translated: If one begins a rite at the time of the red star or the time of the hand,

original: slob ma slob dpon 'brel byed pa //
analyzed: slob ma slob dpon 'brel byed pa //
translated: whatever connection is made between the disciple and the master🔽or if one sets out on a journey, goes shopping,

original: lam 'gro nye tshong byed ba dang // dbang bskur la sogs gang byed pa //
analyzed: lam 'gro nye tshong byed ba dang // dbang bskur la sogs gang byed pa //
translated: or performs an empowerment and so forth,

original: de ni 'chi bdag thebs par 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni 'chi bdag thebs par 'gyur //
translated: one will be struck by the Lord of Death.

original: ngan pa'i las ni gang byed pa //
analyzed: ngan pa'i las ni gang byed pa //
translated: Whatever bad actions one does

original: de yi dus su bzang bar 'gyur //🔽zla ba dang ni ba ba sangs //
analyzed: de yi dus su bzang bar 'gyur // zla ba dang ni ba ba sangs //
translated: will be good at that time.

original: de dus rig pa slobs gyur na //
analyzed: de dus rig pa slobs gyur na //
translated: If one begins a rite at the time of the moon or the time of Venus,

original: go ba ma rnyed gti mug nas //
analyzed: go ba ma rnyed gti mug nas //
translated: and if one does not understand, one will be confused.

original: las ni gang dag byed pa na //
analyzed: las ni gang dag byed pa na //
translated: Whatever actions one does

original: de yi dus su 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi dus su 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: will not be accomplished at that time.

original: de ltar gza' bdun po'i dus su khrus la sogs pa byed pa ni gza' lag pa la bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar gza' bdun po'i dus su khrus la sogs pa byed pa ni gza' lag pa la bya'o //
translated: Thus, the bathing and so forth at the time of the seven planets should be done on Tuesday.

original: gos gsar ba 'drub pa dang gcod pa ni /
analyzed: gos gsar ba 'drub pa dang gcod pa ni /
translated: The sewing and cutting of new clothes

original: zla ba dang ba ba sangs la bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang ba ba sangs la bya'o //
translated: should be done on Monday and Venus.

original: chos la sogs pa'i rig pa @217b ni ;
analyzed: chos la sogs pa'i rig pa @217b ni ;
translated: The knowledge of Dharma and so forth

original: / gza' phur bu la bya'o //
analyzed: / gza' phur bu la bya'o //
translated: should be done on Thursday.

original: khang pa brtsigs pa'am /🔽bag ma len pa'am /
analyzed: khang pa brtsigs pa'am / bag ma len pa'am /
translated: The building of a house,🔽the taking of a bride,

original: bza' gsar pa byed pa ni /
analyzed: bza' gsar pa byed pa ni /
translated: or the making of a new marriage

original: nyi ma dang spen pa la bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma dang spen pa la bya'o //
translated: should be done on Sunday and Saturn.

original: nyi ma las skyes pa'i bu ni shin tu grags pa mis mi thub pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma las skyes pa'i bu ni shin tu grags pa mis mi thub pa'o //
translated: A son born from the sun is very famous and invincible by men.

original: zla ba las skyes pa'i bu ni 'jam zhing dbang po zhen pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba las skyes pa'i bu ni 'jam zhing dbang po zhen pa'o //
translated: A son born from the moon is soft and has dull senses.

original: mig dmar las skyes pa'i bu ni sdig la dga' zhing drag por skyes pa'o //
analyzed: mig dmar las skyes pa'i bu ni sdig la dga' zhing drag por skyes pa'o //
translated: A son born from Mars is fond of evil and is born fierce.

original: pa ba sangs las skyes pa ni /
analyzed: pa ba sangs las skyes pa ni /
translated: One born from Mercury

original: ser sna che zhing 'dod chags la dga' ba'o //
analyzed: ser sna che zhing 'dod chags la dga' ba'o //
translated: is very stingy and fond of desire.

original: phur bu las skyes pa ni shin tu grags la yon tan ldan pa'o //
analyzed: phur bu las skyes pa ni shin tu grags la yon tan ldan pa'o //
translated: One born from Jupiter is very famous and has good qualities.

original: spen pa las skyes pa ni 'bring du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: spen pa las skyes pa ni 'bring du shes par bya'o //
translated: One born from Saturn should be known as middling.

original: gza' lag pa las skyes pa ni ltogs par 'gyur zhing sdig ba la dga' ba'o //
analyzed: gza' lag pa las skyes pa ni ltogs par 'gyur zhing sdig ba la dga' ba'o //
translated: One born on Tuesday will be hungry and delight in sin.

original: nad thams cad 'byung ba'o //🔽de rnams ni gza' brtag ba'o //
analyzed: nad thams cad 'byung ba'o // de rnams ni gza' brtag ba'o //
translated: All diseases will arise.🔽These are the [omens] of the planets.

original: gza'i la nye brtag pa ni /
analyzed: gza'i la nye brtag pa ni /
translated: The omens of the planets are as follows.

original: nyi ma'i dus su ni mdze pho dang nad 'gos pa'i mi dang 'phrad bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dus su ni mdze pho dang nad 'gos pa'i mi dang 'phrad bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At the time of the sun, one will meet a leper or a sick person,

original: yang na btsun ba dang phrad do //
analyzed: yang na btsun ba dang phrad do //
translated: or one will meet a monk.

original: zla ba'i dus su bud med rgan mo gos nag po gon ba dang phrad do //🔽mig dmar gyi dus su ni sngags pa gos dmar po gon ba'am /
analyzed: zla ba'i dus su bud med rgan mo gos nag po gon ba dang phrad do // mig dmar gyi dus su ni sngags pa gos dmar po gon ba'am /
translated: At the time of the moon, one will meet an old woman wearing black clothes.🔽At the time of Mars, one will meet a mantra practitioner wearing red clothes,

original: bud med sham bu dmar po btags pa dang phrad do //
analyzed: bud med sham bu dmar po btags pa dang phrad do //
translated: or a woman wearing a red sash.

original: pa ba sangs kyi dus su ni /
analyzed: pa ba sangs kyi dus su ni /
translated: At the time of Mercury,

original: btsun pa 'am bud med gos ser po gon pa dang phrad do //
analyzed: btsun pa 'am bud med gos ser po gon pa dang phrad do //
translated: one will meet a monk or a woman wearing yellow clothes.

original: phur bu'i dus su ni /
analyzed: phur bu'i dus su ni /
translated: At the time of Jupiter,

original: mda' thogs pa'i mi ral ba can dang phrad do //
analyzed: mda' thogs pa'i mi ral ba can dang phrad do //
translated: one will meet a man with a beard holding an arrow.

original: spen pa'i dus su ni /
analyzed: spen pa'i dus su ni /
translated: At the time of Venus,

original: zhar ba dang phrad do //
analyzed: zhar ba dang phrad do //
translated: one will meet a one-eyed person.🔽At the time of Saturn, one stretches one's legs,

original: lag pa'i dus su rkang pa 'thed ba'am /
analyzed: lag pa'i dus su rkang pa 'thed ba'am /
translated: or one meets a person with a stick.

original: lag pa zha ba dang phrad do //
analyzed: lag pa zha ba dang phrad do //
translated: and the hand is paralyzed.

original: gza' bdun gyi la nye brtag pa'o //
analyzed: gza' bdun gyi la nye brtag pa'o //
translated: The seven planets are to be examined in the same way.

original: gza' r'a hu la dang du ba mjug rings ni /
analyzed: gza' r'a hu la dang du ba mjug rings ni /
translated: Rāhu and Ketu

original: khams lnga'i rang bzhin gzhan gyis mi thub pa drag shul che ba'o //
analyzed: khams lnga'i rang bzhin gzhan gyis mi thub pa drag shul che ba'o //
translated: are the nature of the five elements, unconquerable by others, and very powerful.

original: dpyid zlar ba'i chos bzhi la srod la shar nas nub tu rgyu //
analyzed: dpyid zlar ba'i chos bzhi la srod la shar nas nub tu rgyu //
translated: In the fourth month of spring, they move from the east to the west at dusk.

original: chos brgyad la srod yol nas lho nub mtshams nas byang shar mtshams su rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: chos brgyad la srod yol nas lho nub mtshams nas byang shar mtshams su rgyu ba'o //
translated: In the eighth month, they move from the southwest to the northeast after dusk.

original: tshes bcu gnyis la byang nas lhor rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: tshes bcu gnyis la byang nas lhor rgyu ba'o //
translated: In the twelfth month, they move from the north to the south.

original: bcu drug la nyi ma phyed na shar lho mtshams nas byang shar mtshams su rgyu'o //
analyzed: bcu drug la nyi ma phyed na shar lho mtshams nas byang shar mtshams su rgyu'o //
translated: In the sixteenth month, at noon, they move from the southeast to the northeast.

original: nyi shu tham pa la nub nas shar du nam phyed na rgyu'o //
analyzed: nyi shu tham pa la nub nas shar du nam phyed na rgyu'o //
translated: In the twentieth month, at midnight, they move from the west to the east.

original: nyi shu bzhi la tho rangs ka shar lho nas nub byang du rgyu'o //
analyzed: nyi shu bzhi la tho rangs ka shar lho nas nub byang du rgyu'o //
translated: In the twenty-fourth month, at dawn, they move from the southeast to the northwest.

original: nyi shu brgyad la nyi ma mdung gang na byang nas lhor rgyu'o //
analyzed: nyi shu brgyad la nyi ma mdung gang na byang nas lhor rgyu'o //
translated: In the twenty-eighth month, at the length of a spear, they move from the north to the south.

original: gnam stong la nyi ma nub @218a * //
analyzed: gnam stong la nyi ma nub @218a * //
translated: On the last day of the month, at sunset,🔽they move from the west to the east.

original: nas lho nub mtshams nas byang shar mtshams su rgyu'o //
analyzed: nas lho nub mtshams nas byang shar mtshams su rgyu'o //
translated: [The moon] moves from the southwest to the northeast.

original: dpyid zla 'bring pa'i tshes bzhi la srod la nub nas shar du rgyu'o //
analyzed: dpyid zla 'bring pa'i tshes bzhi la srod la nub nas shar du rgyu'o //
translated: On the fourth day of the middle month of spring, in the evening it moves from west to east.

original: de bzhin du zla ba lhag ma bcu po la yang spel mar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zla ba lhag ma bcu po la yang spel mar shes par bya'o //
translated: In this way, it should be understood that the remaining ten months are alternating.

original: las dang bya ba ci byed kyang gza' rgyu ba dang / gdong thug tu mi bya bar kho dang 'grogs la bya'o //
analyzed: las dang bya ba ci byed kyang gza' rgyu ba dang / gdong thug tu mi bya bar kho dang 'grogs la bya'o //
translated: Whatever work or action is done, one should not do it when the moon is retrograde or in opposition, but one should do it when it is in conjunction.

original: zla ba gang yang rung ba la /
analyzed: zla ba gang yang rung ba la /
translated: In any month,

original: hal khyi rgyu ba ni /
analyzed: hal khyi rgyu ba ni /
translated: the movement of Mercury is as follows.

original: zla ba gang yang rung ba'i tshes gcig la ni snga dro chu tshod lnga la kho gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba gang yang rung ba'i tshes gcig la ni snga dro chu tshod lnga la kho gnas pa'o //
translated: On any first day of the month, at five o'clock in the morning, it is its time.

original: tshes bdun la chu tshod bcu tham pa /
analyzed: tshes bdun la chu tshod bcu tham pa /
translated: On the seventh, at ten o'clock,

original: nyin phyed nas kho'i dus so //
analyzed: nyin phyed nas kho'i dus so //
translated: it is its time from midday.

original: tshes brgyad la nyi ma mdung gang la chu tshod bzhi kho'i dus so //
analyzed: tshes brgyad la nyi ma mdung gang la chu tshod bzhi kho'i dus so //
translated: On the eighth, at noon, at four o'clock, it is its time.

original: tshes bcu bzhi la nyi ma dros nas chu tshod nyi shu kho'i dus so //
analyzed: tshes bcu bzhi la nyi ma dros nas chu tshod nyi shu kho'i dus so //
translated: On the fourteenth, after the sun has warmed up, at twenty o'clock, it is its time.

original: tshes bco lnga la nyi ma phyed nas chu tshod drug kho'i dus so //
analyzed: tshes bco lnga la nyi ma phyed nas chu tshod drug kho'i dus so //
translated: On the fifteenth, from midday, at six o'clock, it is its time.

original: tshes bcu drug la srod 'khor nas chu tshod bdun la kho'i dus so //
analyzed: tshes bcu drug la srod 'khor nas chu tshod bdun la kho'i dus so //
translated: On the sixteenth, from dusk until seven, it is his time.

original: nyi shu gnyis la nam phyed nas chu tshod gsum kho'i dus so //
analyzed: nyi shu gnyis la nam phyed nas chu tshod gsum kho'i dus so //
translated: On the twenty-second, from midnight until three, it is his time.

original: nyi shu gsum la nam phyed nas chu tshod gsum 'das nas chu tshod lnga kho'i dus so //
analyzed: nyi shu gsum la nam phyed nas chu tshod gsum 'das nas chu tshod lnga kho'i dus so //
translated: On the twenty-third, from midnight until three, after three, until five, it is his time.

original: nyi shu dgu la byang drang po nas chu tshod brgyad kho'i dus so //
analyzed: nyi shu dgu la byang drang po nas chu tshod brgyad kho'i dus so //
translated: On the twenty-ninth, from eight in the north, it is his time.

original: gnam stong la nyi ma phyed nas nam phyed du rgyu'o //
analyzed: gnam stong la nyi ma phyed nas nam phyed du rgyu'o //
translated: On the thirtieth, from noon until midnight, it moves.

original: de'i dus su las dang bya ba ci byed kyang /
analyzed: de'i dus su las dang bya ba ci byed kyang /
translated: At that time, whatever work or activity is done,

original: sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bas /
analyzed: sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bas /
translated: all suffering will arise.

original: de'i phyir na las bya ba ci yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na las bya ba ci yang mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, do not do any work at all.

original: hal khyi na lnga yod do //
analyzed: hal khyi na lnga yod do //
translated: There are five halakhi.

original: hal khyi nag po dang dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar bo dang / ljang gu dang lnga bo de zla ba dkar po dang nag po /
analyzed: hal khyi nag po dang dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar bo dang / ljang gu dang lnga bo de zla ba dkar po dang nag po /
translated: The five, the black, white, yellow, red, and green halakhi, are the white and black moon.

original: stod smad du spel nas rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: stod smad du spel nas rgyu ba'o //
translated: They move by alternating above and below.

original: khyi'i gzugs su yod pa /
analyzed: khyi'i gzugs su yod pa /
translated: They have the form of a dog.

original: mjug na yang gdong pa yod pa /
analyzed: mjug na yang gdong pa yod pa /
translated: At the end of the tail, there is also a face.

original: kha nas me 'bar ba de dang 'phrad par gyur na gang gis kyang mi thub cing sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kha nas me 'bar ba de dang 'phrad par gyur na gang gis kyang mi thub cing sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one encounters the one with fire blazing from the mouth, no one can overcome it, and all suffering will arise.

original: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni /
analyzed: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni /
translated: The twenty-eight lunar mansions

original: de ltar phyogs na bdun bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar phyogs na bdun bdun no //
translated: are seven in each direction.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: smin drug ni me'i khams /
analyzed: smin drug ni me'i khams /
translated: The sixth lunar mansion is the fire element.

original: snar ma ni chu'i khams /
analyzed: snar ma ni chu'i khams /
translated: The seventh lunar mansion is the water element.

original: mgo ni sa'i khams /🔽lag ni shing gi khams /
analyzed: mgo ni sa'i khams / lag ni shing gi khams /
translated: The eighth lunar mansion is the earth element.🔽The ninth lunar mansion is the wood element.

original: nab so lcags kyi khams so //
analyzed: nab so lcags kyi khams so //
translated: The tenth lunar mansion is the iron element.

original: rgyal chu'i khams //
analyzed: rgyal chu'i khams //
translated: The eleventh lunar mansion is the water element.

original: skag me'i khams so //
analyzed: skag me'i khams so //
translated: The twelfth lunar mansion is the fire element.

original: bdun bo de dag ni shar phyogs na gnas so //
analyzed: bdun bo de dag ni shar phyogs na gnas so //
translated: Those seven are located in the east.

original: mchu ni sa'i khams //🔽gre ni chu'i khams /🔽dbo ni shing gi khams /
analyzed: mchu ni sa'i khams // gre ni chu'i khams / dbo ni shing gi khams /
translated: The thirteenth lunar mansion is the earth element.🔽The fourteenth lunar mansion is the water element.🔽The fifteenth lunar mansion is the wood element.

original: me bzhi ni lcags kyi khams /
analyzed: me bzhi ni lcags kyi khams /
translated: The sixteenth lunar mansion is the iron element.

original: nag pa me'i khams /🔽sa ri sa'i khams /
analyzed: nag pa me'i khams / sa ri sa'i khams /
translated: The seventeenth lunar mansion is the fire element.🔽The eighteenth lunar mansion is the earth element.

original: sa ga chu'i khams so //
analyzed: sa ga chu'i khams so //
translated: The nineteenth lunar mansion is the water element.

original: de dag bdun po ni lho na gnas so //
analyzed: de dag bdun po ni lho na gnas so //
translated: Those seven are located in the south.

original: lha mtshams chu'i khams /
analyzed: lha mtshams chu'i khams /
translated: The twentieth lunar mansion is the water element.

original: snron @218b me'i khams /🔽snu bas sa'i khams /
analyzed: snron @218b me'i khams / snu bas sa'i khams /
translated: The twenty-first lunar mansion is the fire element.🔽The twenty-second lunar mansion is the earth element.

original: chu stod shing gi khams /
analyzed: chu stod shing gi khams /
translated: The twenty-third lunar mansion is the wood element.

original: chu smad lcags kyi khams //🔽byi bzhin me'i khams /
analyzed: chu smad lcags kyi khams // byi bzhin me'i khams /
translated: The middle of the month of water is the element of iron.🔽The middle of the month of fire is the element of fire.

original: gro bzhin sa'i khams so //
analyzed: gro bzhin sa'i khams so //
translated: The middle of the month of earth is the element of earth.

original: bdun bo de dag ni nub kyi phyogs na gnas sa //🔽mon gru chu'i khams /🔽mon gre lcags kyi khams /
analyzed: bdun bo de dag ni nub kyi phyogs na gnas sa // mon gru chu'i khams / mon gre lcags kyi khams /
translated: These seven are located in the west.🔽The middle of the month of water is the element of water.

original: khrums stod sa'i khams /
analyzed: khrums stod sa'i khams /
translated: The middle of the month of iron is the element of iron.🔽The middle of the month of earth is the element of earth.

original: khrums smad shing gi khams /🔽na ma gru me'i khams /
analyzed: khrums smad shing gi khams / na ma gru me'i khams /
translated: The middle of the month of wood is the element of wood.

original: tha skar sa'i khams so //
analyzed: tha skar sa'i khams so //
translated: The middle of the month of fire is the element of fire.🔽The middle of the month of earth is the element of earth.

original: bra nye shing gi khams so //
analyzed: bra nye shing gi khams so //
translated: The middle of the month of wood is the element of wood.

original: bdun po de dag ni byang gi phyogs na gnas so //
analyzed: bdun po de dag ni byang gi phyogs na gnas so //
translated: These seven are located in the north.

original: skar ma gza' bdun de dag de bzhin te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: skar ma gza' bdun de dag de bzhin te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The seven planets are as follows: The seven planets are as follows.

original: gza' de yang bdun bzhir rgyu ste /
analyzed: gza' de yang bdun bzhir rgyu ste /
translated: The planets also move in seven groups of four.

original: bdun bdun pho mo 'brel nas /
analyzed: bdun bdun pho mo 'brel nas /
translated: Seven by seven, male and female,

original: bzang ba dang ngan par ston pa'o //
analyzed: bzang ba dang ngan par ston pa'o //
translated: indicate good and bad.

original: rdzu 'phrul che zhing dka' thub che //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul che zhing dka' thub che //
translated: Great miracles, great austerities,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas par bskor ba'o //
analyzed: gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas par bskor ba'o //
translated: encircling the four continents and Mount Meru.

original: 'jig rten gyi mi rnams la bzang ba dang ngan par ston pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi mi rnams la bzang ba dang ngan par ston pa ste /
translated: They indicate good and bad for the people of the world.

original: de'i dus tshod shes par gyur na /
analyzed: de'i dus tshod shes par gyur na /
translated: If one knows their time,

original: bzlog par btub /
analyzed: bzlog par btub /
translated: It is possible to avert them.🔽The sun and moon,

original: pa'o // nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // sum cu rtsa gsum tshang bdag / ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: pa'o // nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // sum cu rtsa gsum tshang bdag / ces bya ba ni /
translated: and the lord of the thirty-three

original: zla ba re re la gza' dgu dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad tshang ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba re re la gza' dgu dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad tshang ba'o //
translated: means that each month has nine planets and twenty-eight lunar mansions.

original: nyi ma dang zla ba mig dmar dang / ba ba sangs dang / phur bu spen pa lag pa /🔽r'a hu la du ba mjug rings /
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba mig dmar dang / ba ba sangs dang / phur bu spen pa lag pa / r'a hu la du ba mjug rings /
translated: The sun, moon, Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Venus, Saturn, Rahu, and Ketu

original: shar gyi phyogs nas go rims bzhin du rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: shar gyi phyogs nas go rims bzhin du rgyu ba'o //
translated: move in the eastern direction in order.

original: skar ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //🔽r'a hu la dang du ba mjug rings ni /
analyzed: skar ma rnams kyang de bzhin no // r'a hu la dang du ba mjug rings ni /
translated: The lunar mansions are also like that.

original: tshes grangs mi 'dzin te /
analyzed: tshes grangs mi 'dzin te /
translated: Rahu and Ketu do not have lunar days.

original: gzhan gyi tshes grangs la gza' gnyis po thod rgal du rgyu'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshes grangs la gza' gnyis po thod rgal du rgyu'o //
translated: The two planets Rahu and Ketu move in the lunar days of others.

original: 'char ba dang ni nub pa ni //
analyzed: 'char ba dang ni nub pa ni //
translated: Rising and setting

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: phyi mngon pa'i dbang du bshad ba dang / nang gas bsngags kyi dbang du bshad pa ni /
analyzed: phyi mngon pa'i dbang du bshad ba dang / nang gas bsngags kyi dbang du bshad pa ni /
translated: that the explanation is from the perspective of the outer and the explanation is from the perspective of the inner.

original: shar ba ni 'jig rten khams kyi mi rnams /
analyzed: shar ba ni 'jig rten khams kyi mi rnams /
translated: Rising is the people of the world.

original: skyes pa la ni nyi ma shar ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: skyes pa la ni nyi ma shar ba zhes bya'o //
translated: For men, it is called the rising of the sun.

original: dper na 'jig rten du nyi ma shar ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na 'jig rten du nyi ma shar ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the sun rising in the world.

original: nub pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rgas nas shi ba la nub pa zhes bya'o /
analyzed: nub pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rgas nas shi ba la nub pa zhes bya'o /
translated: Setting is called “setting” in the world when an old person dies.

original: 'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu //
analyzed: 'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu //
translated: It moves like a wheel and a weapon.🔽This is

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the meaning of the above verse.

original: rgyu lugs rnam pa gsum yod de /
analyzed: rgyu lugs rnam pa gsum yod de /
translated: There are three ways of moving:

original: 'khor lo bzhin du rgyu ba dang / mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu ba dang / dbyu gu'i gros kyis rgyu ba gsum yod pa las /
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhin du rgyu ba dang / mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu ba dang / dbyu gu'i gros kyis rgyu ba gsum yod pa las /
translated: moving like a wheel, moving like a weapon, and moving by the calculation of a staff.

original: 'khor lo bzhin du rgyu ba ni /🔽'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri rab la /
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhin du rgyu ba ni / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri rab la /
translated: Moving like a wheel is

original: zla ba 'khor lo'i @219a * //🔽'gros su rgyu ba'o //🔽mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu ba ni /🔽nyi ma'i 'gros te tha skar rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba 'khor lo'i @219a * // 'gros su rgyu ba'o // mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu ba ni / nyi ma'i 'gros te tha skar rgyu ba'o //
translated: the movement of the moon around Meru in the world system.🔽Moving like a wheel is the movement of the moon around Meru in the world system.🔽Moving like a weapon is the movement of the sun.

original: dbyu gu'i 'gros ni chu tshod la brtsis te /
analyzed: dbyu gu'i 'gros ni chu tshod la brtsis te /
translated: Moving by the calculation of a staff is calculated by the hour.

original: gcig por nas gcig len pa dbyu gu'i 'gros so //
analyzed: gcig por nas gcig len pa dbyu gu'i 'gros so //
translated: Taking one from one is the movement of the staff.

original: de bzhin du gza' rnams kyang rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gza' rnams kyang rgyu ba'o //
translated: In the same way, the planets also move.

original: da ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang du byas na sna bug g-yas g-yon gnyis na rgyu ba'i dbugs ni /
analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang du byas na sna bug g-yas g-yon gnyis na rgyu ba'i dbugs ni /
translated: Now, from the point of view of yoga, the breath that moves in the two nostrils, right and left,

original: nyin mo dang nub mo rgyu ba ni rgyu skar bzhin no //
analyzed: nyin mo dang nub mo rgyu ba ni rgyu skar bzhin no //
translated: moves during the day and night like the stars.

original: nyin zhag gcig la chu tshod drug cu yod pa la /
analyzed: nyin zhag gcig la chu tshod drug cu yod pa la /
translated: In one day and night there are sixty periods of time.

original: dbugs kyang de bzhin du rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: dbugs kyang de bzhin du rgyu ba'o //
translated: The breath moves in the same way.

original: 'jig rten du ni zad 'phel byed //
analyzed: 'jig rten du ni zad 'phel byed //
translated: It causes increase and decrease in the world.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: This is what is said.

original: zla ba ni tshes stod la 'phel te /
analyzed: zla ba ni tshes stod la 'phel te /
translated: The moon increases in the bright half of the month.

original: smad la 'gribs nas zad de /
analyzed: smad la 'gribs nas zad de /
translated: It decreases and becomes exhausted in the dark half.

original: dbugs kyang phyir 'gro ba ni ring ste /
analyzed: dbugs kyang phyir 'gro ba ni ring ste /
translated: The exhalation of the breath is long.

original: nang du rngub pa ni thung ste /
analyzed: nang du rngub pa ni thung ste /
translated: The inhalation is short.

original: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la yang zad pa dang 'phel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la yang zad pa dang 'phel bar byed pa'o //
translated: In the same way, it causes the exhaustion and increase of sentient beings who live in the world.

original: de bas na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la yang /
analyzed: de bas na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la yang /
translated: Therefore, the increase and decrease of the life of sentient beings in the world

original: tshe'i 'phel 'grib 'byung ngo //
analyzed: tshe'i 'phel 'grib 'byung ngo //
translated: occurs.

original: yang na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams nor 'phel ba dang / nor 'grib pa yang 'byung ngo //
analyzed: yang na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams nor 'phel ba dang / nor 'grib pa yang 'byung ngo //
translated: Or, the increase and decrease of wealth of people in the world occurs.

original: zla ba ji bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'phel 'grib byed do //
analyzed: zla ba ji bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'phel 'grib byed do //
translated: Just as the moon waxes and wanes, so too does the world system.

original: gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul chen po dag / ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul chen po dag / ces bya ba ni /
translated: Those of great splendor and great magical power

original: rdzu 'phrul ni gling bzhi dang ri rab la rgyu ba ste /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul ni gling bzhi dang ri rab la rgyu ba ste /
translated: Magical power means moving through the four continents and Mount Meru.

original: gzhan rnams kyang zil gyis gnon pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyang zil gyis gnon pa'o //
translated: It also means overpowering others.

original: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi sgyu ma bzhin du snang bas na /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi sgyu ma bzhin du snang bas na /
translated: In the same way, because it appears like a worldly illusion,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams na gzi brjid che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams na gzi brjid che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba'o //
translated: it is of great splendor and great magical power in the world system.

original: rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis su //
analyzed: rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis su //
translated: With a mind of faith

original: rig sngags rjes su yi rang byos //
analyzed: rig sngags rjes su yi rang byos //
translated: Rejoice in the knowledge-mantra.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means

original: 'jig rten khams na gnas pa'i gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: 'jig rten khams na gnas pa'i gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyis kyang /
translated: that the planets and stars that abide in the world system

original: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la gus pa'i sems kyis rjes su yi rang bas te /
analyzed: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la gus pa'i sems kyis rjes su yi rang bas te /
translated: with a respectful mind rejoice in the Queen of Knowledge-Mantra Mahāmāyūrī,

original: rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o //
analyzed: rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o //
translated: and do not transgress the command of the knowledge-mantra.

original: de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis /
analyzed: de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis /
translated: They too, by this Queen of Knowledge-Mantra Mahāmāyūrī,

original: bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni /
translated: “Protect me!”

original: nam mkha' bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab ste /
translated: It pervades the world systems like space.

original: de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis brjod du mi btub pa /
analyzed: de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis brjod du mi btub pa /
translated: Moreover, it is inconceivable and inexpressible.

original: rgya cher sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o//
analyzed: rgya cher sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o//
translated: It benefits sentient beings on a vast scale.

original: @219b de lta bu'i rig sngags gang zag gang gis kyang gus par byas nas 'chang bar gyur na /
analyzed: @219b de lta bu'i rig sngags gang zag gang gis kyang gus par byas nas 'chang bar gyur na /
translated: If any person respectfully upholds this awareness mantra,

original: gza' dang rgyu skar ngan ba yang zlogs te /
analyzed: gza' dang rgyu skar ngan ba yang zlogs te /
translated: even inauspicious planets and stars will be averted.

original: de rnams kyis srung pa dang skyob par byed do //
analyzed: de rnams kyis srung pa dang skyob par byed do //
translated: They will protect and guard him.

original: tshe phyi ma la yang gza' dang rgyu skar bzang po las skyes nas /
analyzed: tshe phyi ma la yang gza' dang rgyu skar bzang po las skyes nas /
translated: In his next life, he will be born under auspicious planets and stars.

original: rig sngags 'di dran par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig sngags 'di dran par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will remember this awareness mantra.

original: sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Conceal”

original: snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: should be understood as before.

original: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las /
analyzed: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las /
translated: From the Queen of Awareness Manjushri’s Magical Wheel

original: gza' dang rgyu skar gyi gnas skabs te bco brgyad pa'o /
analyzed: gza' dang rgyu skar gyi gnas skabs te bco brgyad pa'o /
translated: this completes the eighteenth chapter on the state of the planets and stars.

original: // / kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: // / kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Ananda”

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: It is the word of the Perfectly Awakened One.

original: gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams yan chad /
analyzed: gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams yan chad /
translated: The four great continents of the world system,

original: man chad kyi lha rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: man chad kyi lha rnams kyi ming zung shig ces bya ba ni /
translated: gather the names of the gods above and below.

original: gling bzhin gnas pa'i lha dang / 'dod lha ris drug dang / gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi'i lha'o //
analyzed: gling bzhin gnas pa'i lha dang / 'dod lha ris drug dang / gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi'i lha'o //
translated: The gods who dwell in the four continents, the six classes of desire realm gods, and the four formless realms of the formless realm gods.

original: de rnams kyi mchan nyid ni 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de rnams kyi mchan nyid ni 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Their names are as follows.

original: ming dang / gzugs dang / cho dang / longs spyod dang / gnas so //
analyzed: ming dang / gzugs dang / cho dang / longs spyod dang / gnas so //
translated: Name, form, appearance, enjoyment, and abode.

original: 'di lta ste ni 'di rnams lta ba'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste ni 'di rnams lta ba'o //
translated: This is how they are seen.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The gods of the Four Great Kings,

original: rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams kyi lus tshad ni /
analyzed: rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams kyi lus tshad ni /
translated: The body size of the gods of the Four Great Kings' class is

original: rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcig go //
analyzed: rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcig go //
translated: one-fourth of a krosa.

original: tshe tshad ni mi lo lnga bcu la /
analyzed: tshe tshad ni mi lo lnga bcu la /
translated: Their lifespan is fifty human years,

original: rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi zhag gcig / nyin zhag gsum cu la zla ba gcig / zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe tshad mtha' ni /
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi zhag gcig / nyin zhag gsum cu la zla ba gcig / zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe tshad mtha' ni /
translated: One day and night of the Caturmaharajika gods is🔽thirty human years.🔽Thirty of their days and nights make one of their months, and twelve of their months make one of their years.

original: lo de ltar brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya ste /
analyzed: lo de ltar brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya ste /
translated: The lifespan of the Caturmaharajika gods is five hundred of their years, which🔽is calculated as follows:

original: bar mdor 'chi ba yod do //
analyzed: bar mdor 'chi ba yod do //
translated: They die in the middle.

original: mi ltar brtsis na lo sa ya phrag dgu yod do //
analyzed: mi ltar brtsis na lo sa ya phrag dgu yod do //
translated: If calculated in terms of human years, it is nine million years.

original: nyon mongs pa ni dbang po gnyis sbyor bas tshim pa'o //

analyzed: tshad ni dpag tshad gnyis yod do //

analyzed: gnyis pas chung bas so //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi zas la spyod do //

analyzed: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: tshe tshad ni bskal pa lnga brgya'o //
translated: Their lifespan is five hundred eons.🔽The etymology of their name is as follows: because their discernment is not

analyzed: nges tshig ni 'du shes de shes pa nad du 'khyil bas ngan par shes pa skyes te /
